tags: yep time to be sad after all of yesterday's sad ur welcome
im expecting beauyasha angst w/ this info
summary: Ok, I was looking at D&D races and I find it very interesting that, as opposed to the three half elves and two gnomes in the...
body:
Ok, I was looking at D&D races and I find it very interesting that, as opposed to the three half elves and two gnomes in the last campaign, all who have “a lineage in a lifespan,” nearly all TM9 have natural lifespans that are comparable to a human, with half orcs and goblins living a little less on average and tieflings living a little more-

-and then there’s aasimar, who can live up to 200 years.

Everyone in the party can grow old together but the one aasimar, her angelic youth a sad contrast to their slowly aging faces. The one aasimar who already wanders alone, perhaps not realizing that in the future there may be a time where there will be no one left to come back to. Perhaps she already does.

(yes, i am sad)

(yes, i am sad)

Everyone in the party can grow old together but the one aasimar, her angelic youth a sad contrast to their slowly aging faces. The one aasimar who already wanders alone, perhaps not realizing that in the future there may be a time where there will be no one left to come back to. Perhaps she already does.

(yes, i am sad)

-and then there’s aasimar, who can live up to 200 years.

tags: i like to be canon compliant is all
title: de Rolo question
body:
Is it canon or fanon that Whitney and Oliver are twins?

I’ve also seen debate on whether Whitney is a boy or a girl since it’s a unisex name and because of small moments earlier in the campaign, but I think of her as a girl because of an episode in the early 90s(?) where Percy refers to Whitney as his sister to Keyleth, a moment I’ve been trying to find again for a long time btw. Anyone remember that?

reblog.comment:
Is it canon or fanon that Whitney and Oliver are twins?

I’ve also seen debate on whether Whitney is a boy or a girl since it’s a unisex name and because of small moments earlier in the campaign, but I think of her as a girl because of an episode in the early 90s(?) where Percy refers to Whitney as his sister to Keyleth, a moment I’ve been trying to find again for a long time btw. Anyone remember that?

Anyone remember that?

tags: what i think about at 2 am
summary: The Mighty Nein's reaction to walking in on someone:
body:
The Mighty Nein’s reaction to walking in on someone:

Caleb: *stays frozen in place for a solid minute and later pretends he didnt see anything*

Yasha: *raises an eyebrow and walks out without a word*

Molly: most likely to be walked in on himself, just chuckles and waves it off in both cases

Fjord:*blushing and adverting his eyes as he gently closes the door* S'cuse me!

Beau: Holly f*ck! *proceeds to grumble and curse for the rest of the night*

Jester: HAVE FUN! *slams door and proceeds to tell everyone she passes exactly what is happening in the room*

Nott: MY EEEEEYYYEEEESSSS…

summary: So, since my friend saw Marisha looking over Ashley’s shoulder during last night’s show she’s been saying “All I could see was...
caption:
So, since my friend saw Marisha looking over Ashley’s shoulder during last night’s show she’s been saying “All I could see was Beauyasha!” So I decided to try and draw it. 

This is my first time drawing these girls, and yes, it’s handrawn because I cannot do digital art for the life of me.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: proudlyunicorn
blog.title: heda of thirstkru
blog.description: I'm Kara. I'm 28. I am trash for ladies in love with ladies. I fangirl hard and ship nothing casually. I am shit at tagging things, you've been warned. Also, I love y'all dearly, but please don't ask me about spoilers (unless you've seen me post something about them). I don't read them and sending me asks about them is just spoiling the show for me. I like to be surprised! Thanks! Current shows include: Supergirl, Wynonna Earp, The Good Place, Critical Role, and a few others. Shoutout to @gleerant for being my awesome wife.

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: So I definitely hope at least one of the guests is a cleric because they desperately need it, but I also really want Cali to...
body: So I definitely hope at least one of the guests is a cleric because they desperately need it, but I also really want Cali to come back and find out that her new best friend penpal got kidnapped and go off into a full black dragon rage on those fuckers.
